title: For Housing Finance Companies GNPAs Rose 70 Bps On Tighter Norms: CRISIL - Goodreturns
content: For Housing Finance Companies GNPAs Rose 70 Bps On Tighter Norms: CRISIL  Goodreturns
description: Gross non-performing assets (GNPAs) of housing finance companies (HFCs) rose to 3.3% as on December 31, 2021, from 3.0% as on September 30, 2021, attributable to Reserve Bank of Indiaâ€™s (RBI) November 12, 2021, clarification1 on recognition and calculation of NPAs, rather than any real mark-down in asset quality.
